CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The corresponding PCE is 4.12% , about 37% higher than that obtained from a PCDTBT - based reference device.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCE for PCE-based device |
| PCE for PCDTBT-based reference device |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCE for PCE-based device |
| PCE for PCDTBT-based reference device |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions two materials - "PCE for PCE-based device" and "PCE for PCDTBT-based reference device". These are the material names that can be identified from the paragraph. Other entities such as "corresponding", "about", "higher", and "that obtained" do not clearly refer to material names and can be ignored.
